SEARCH

Class App

java.lang.Object
App
public class App extends Object
Main class to manage the Goa Legislative Assembly system. Provides functionalities such as adding members, scheduling sessions, proposing bills, and voting on bills.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • App

      public App()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to run the menu-based system.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments.

    • addMember

      public static void addMember()
      Adds a new member to the legislative assembly. Collects member details from the user and creates a new Member object.

    • scheduleSession

      public static void scheduleSession()
      Schedules a session for the legislative assembly. Collects session details such as date and agenda from the user.

    • proposeBill

      public static void proposeBill()
      Proposes a new bill in the assembly by a member. The user provides the member's name and bill details.

    • voteOnBill

      public static void voteOnBill()
      Records a member's vote on a bill. The user provides the member's name, the bill's title, and the vote (yes/no).

    • displayMembers

      public static void displayMembers()
      Displays a list of all the members in the legislative assembly.

    • findMemberByName

      public static Member findMemberByName(String name)
      Finds a member in the legislative assembly by name.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the member to search for.
      Returns:
      Member object if found, otherwise null.
